name: Yae Miko
desc:
"Astute Amusement" Yae Miko

The wise and beautiful Yae Miko.

desc.text:
<color=#ffd780>Elemental Burst</color>
Deals 4 <color=#ffacff>Electro DMG</color> . If your side of the field has any <color=#ffffff>Sesshou Sakura</color> , destroy them and create <color=#ffffff>Tenko Thunderbolts</color> .
<color=#ece5d8>Tenko Thunderbolts</color>
<color=#ffd780>Combat Status</color>
<color=#ffffff>Before you choose your action</color> : Deal 3 <color=#ffacff>Electro DMG</color> .
<color=#ffffff>Usage(s): 1</color>

<color=#ffd780>Summon</color>
<color=#ffffff>End Phase</color> : Deal 1 <color=#ffacff>Electro DMG</color>
<color=#ffffff>Usage(s): 3</color> (Can stack, max 6 stacks)
<color=#ffffff>When you declare the end of your Round</color> : If this summon has at least 4 Usage(s) remaining, deal 1 <color=#ffacff>Electro DMG</color> . (Consumes Usage(s))

Applies Electro and can trigger the following Elemental Reactions:
[ <color=#ffacff>Electro</color> + <color=#ff9999>Pyro</color> ] <color=#ffffff>Overloaded</color> : DMG +2 for this instance, the target is forcibly switched to the next character
[ <color=#ffacff>Electro</color> + <color=#99ffff>Cryo</color> ] <color=#ffffff>Superconduct</color> : DMG +1 for this instance, deal 1 Piercing DMG to all opposing characters except the target
[ <color=#ffacff>Electro</color> + <color=#80c0ff>Hydro</color> ] <color=#ffffff>Electro-Charged</color> : DMG +1 for this instance, deal 1 Piercing DMG to all opposing characters except the target
[ <color=#ffacff>Electro</color> + <color=#99ff88>Dendro</color> ] <color=#ffffff>Quicken</color> : DMG +1 for this instance, creates a [ <color=#ffffff>Catalyzing Field</color> ] that grants +1 DMG to the next 2 instances of Dendro or Electro DMG

<color=#ece5d8>Usage(s)</color>
After this card's effect is triggered, 1 <color=#ffffff>Usage</color> of it will be consumed.
This card will be discarded immediately once it has 0 <color=#ffffff>Usages</color> remaining.

value.name: The Shrine's Sacred Shade
value.desc:
Yae Miko: The Shrine's Sacred Shade

"Ah... A sight to behold..."

value.text: Reward for inviting Yae Miko to a duel at The Cat's Tail and claiming victory in a Friendly Fracas with her

value.name: Yae Miko
value.desc: Lady Guuji of the Grand Narukami Shrine. Also serves as the editor-in-chief of Yae Publishing House. Unimaginable intelligence and cunning are hidden under her beautiful appearance.

customize.name: Yae Miko
customize.desc:
"Astute Amusement" Yae Miko

The wise and beautiful Yae Miko.

customize.name: Lucky Coin
customize.desc: Currency verified and used by the Genius Invokation TCG Society. Can be used to purchase various items related to Genius Invokation TCG. It is said that these coins were initially named as such in the hopes that they would bring those carrying them luck. However, perhaps it is those who are sufficiently lucky who are able to possess them...

customize.text: Can also be exchanged using a

customize.name: Blank Dynamic Card
customize.desc: A blank card with a painted back. It is said that if you put the name of your desired dynamic card on this blank card, you can get the very skin from the Association agent located at the tavern.

customize.text:
<color=#ffd780>Stage Introduction</color>
"Oh? You wish to duel me, little one? Well, I hope you've brought your best deck with you..."
<color=#ccbfad>Hint: Yae Miko's deck contains many Artifact Cards, and she can also create large numbers of Summons. This allows her to constantly build momentum and control the duel as the match progresses.</color>
<color=#ffffffd9>Opposing Lineup</color>

customize.desc:

The wise and beautiful Yae Miko.

customize.name: Fischl
customize.desc:
"Fischl, Prinzessin der Verurteilung!" Fischl

"Oz, mine familiar, spread thine wings and weave for me a new fate in the gloom of this night!"

"Mein Fräulein, you cannot expect me to fetch you a replacement card…"

customize.name: Tighnari
customize.desc:
"Verdant Strider" Tighnari
From a certain perspective, experience does not hold parity with wisdom.

customize.name: Match Invitation Letter
customize.desc: You can select a player from the Player List via the invitation board, and then entrust The Cat's Tail to send out an invitation using this Invitation Letter. The invited player will head over to the tavern and wait for a duel with you.
